title: eye steak with deep fried onion rings and onion butter
description: James Martin makes his succulent steaks even more spectacular with homemade onion butter and giant onion rings.
ingredients: 2 large onions (or 1 huge onion), half cut into thick rings, half finely diced
2 tbsp fresh flatleaf parsley, leaves roughly chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
4 x 200g/7oz rib-eye steaks, at room temperature
